actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Employment Opportunities.

official_title: A bill to amend the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to eliminate the upper age limitation of 70 years of age established in section 12 of such Act.

summary.text: Amends the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to remove the existing 70 year upper age limit to which the prohibitions of such Act apply, thus extending the protection of such Act to all individuals who are at least 40 years of age.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to eliminate the upper age limitation of 70 years of age established in section 12 of such Act.
